          <title>

          <description>
            <string language="en">A animation which demostrates distillation in the laboratory, as a means of separated or purifying substances</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates Destillation im 
Labor, als Mittel von getrennt oder Reinigensubstanzen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui distillation de demostrates 
dans le laboratoire, en tant que moyens de séparé ou substances 
d'épuration</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que distillation dos demostrates no

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates απόσταξη στο

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que destilación de los
